title: White screens. Can't connect
body: I'm on Mac and since yesterday, I can't connect to any game. I select my champ. Everything is alright. But when we go to the loading screens with allies and ennemies. I don't that, I see white screens then it crashes. I try to reconnect but again white screens. What can I do ?

replies.body:
Once you go into the loading screen, there's a lot going on from drivers starting to load assets to connections being made with our game servers. Since your client is crashing at that point, it's a little hard to narrow down precisely what is causing that crash. 

Let's start by going through our [**crash guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974). Let me know how that helps!
